poem:
### Eight Voices in Echo

In the hum of clicks, a chorus grows,  
Eight hands sketching fortunes, silent flow,  
Social threads weave the bargain's bright show,  
In the marketplace's shadow, whispers glow.  
The sum of profit, like a river's grace,  
Pours from a staff of eight in digital space.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "China’s Temu more than doubles EU profits to nearly $120m despite having only eight staff The Chinese online marketplace Temu’s EU operations more than doubled pre-tax profits last year to just below $120m (£90m) despite employing just eight people, accounts show. They rose 171% in the 12 months to December 2024 compared with the $44.1m the year before, as shoppers snapped up its low-cost goods, which are widely promoted on social media. However, the company". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
